name: salamander
short_description: Code for the SALAMANDER environmental sensor project. SALAMANDERs are wireless motes (Crossbow TelosB with MSP430 processor) with a string of sensors attached. Mote code is in nesC. DataGetter java code enables mobile phones to collect sensor data.
